name: .RFS
summary: Learn about .RFS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: RFS files are meant to be opened using Reflection FTP Client or SFTP Client's Script menu. The Script menu allows users to edit or execute the script an RFS file contains. Users can also run RFS scripts at Reflection FTP Client or SFTP Client's startup by providing the scripts as command line parameters.
